――今回の仕事には、陰謀を仕掛けられている疑いがある、と？: ――Are you saying there's a suspicion that this job is plotting something?
プレ・クラス－Ａ生徒の訓練の話を持ち掛けられた後、\n俺は生徒会長からそう伝えら:
After being asked to talk about pre-class-A students' training,
That's what the student council president told me.
今回の話……実は生徒会発案の物ではありません。\n『学園理事会』から持ち掛けられ:
This isn't actually the Student Council's idea.
It was proposed by the academy board of directors.
各校舎――つまり、学園がザルトゥーム島の各地区……: Each school building—in other words, each district of Zarthum Island...
『リバティ』『スカラ』『アマツ』『レドフカ』『ノヴァセレス』から、\n出資を受け:
From Liberty, Scara, Amatsu, Redovka, and Nova Celes...
You already know that you're being funded, right?
ああ、める達から聞いた。: Yeah, I heard it from Meguru and the others.
その各行政府の上位陣で構成される組織。それが学園理事会です。: An organization composed of high-ranking members of each executive government. That's the academy's board of directors.
通常、学園の運営は生徒会に一任されているので、\n理事会がこういった介入を行うの:
Normally, the management of the academy is left to the student council
It's unusual for the board of directors to intervene like this.
各地区の行政トップの介入か。\n今まであまりなかったのに急にってところが怪しいな:
The intervention of the administrative leaders of each district, huh?
There haven't been many of them up until now, but it's suspicious that they're suddenly here.
まさしくその通りです。今回の依頼が失敗すれば、\n責任はあなた……生徒会付き教導:
Exactly. If this request fails,
The responsibility lies with you... The Student Council's instructor.
そしてあなたを任命した私の責任も問われることになるでしょう。\nこれは生徒会その:
And I will be held accountable for appointing you.
This might be an attack to shake the student council itself.
そこまでわかっていながら、どうして俺を？: If you know that much, why me?
あなたならば任せられる。そう思ったからです。: I can leave it to you. That's what I thought.
……ずるい言い方だな。そう言われたら断るに断れない。: ...That's not fair. I can't refuse when she puts it that way.
いや、責めてるわけじゃないよ。\n思ってたより信用されているようで、ちょっとほっ:
No, I'm not blaming you.
She seemed to trust me more than I expected, which was a bit of a relief.
……ありがとうございます。ですが、気を付けてください。: ...Thank you very much. But please be careful.
プレ・クラス－Ａの４人の中に、\n理事会の息がかかった『スパイ』がいる可能性があ:
Among the four members of Pre-Class-A,
There is a possibility that the board of directors has a spy.
――誰がスパイなのか。\nさすがに初日の動きで見破ることは不可能だった。:
—Who's a spy?
Of course, it was impossible to see through her movements on the first day.
……だって、どいつもこいつも問題児なんだもん！\n全員、俺に恥をかかせるために送:
...But they're all problem children!
They were all sent here to embarrass me, weren't they?!
そうだよな！？ そうだと言ってくれ！！: Isn't that right!? Tell me that's right!!
――戦闘終了後、一同は一旦メイズを出て、\n出入り口『ポータル』に集まった。:
—After the battle was over, everyone left Mayse for the moment
We gathered at the entrance, Portal.
全員機体から降り、俺からのフィードバックを受ける。: Everyone gets out of the aircraft and receives feedback from me.
あー……なんだ。ひとまず指揮官として、\nお前達４人の問題点を洗い出してみた。:
Ah... Well, as a commander,
I tried to figure out the problem with the four of you.
まずはジュリー。お前はリーダー志望だったな？: First, Julie. You wanted to be the leader, didn't you?
そうよ！ 素質抜群でしょ！: That's right! You've got great potential!
どっからそんな自信が湧くんだよ……まずは状況判断を的確にしろ。\n考えなしの突撃:
Where did that confidence come from...? First, make sure to assess the situation correctly.
Charging without thinking wasn't even an instruction.
次、ラウラ。……メイズシフターを怖がっていたら、\nここでの探索なんて不可能だぞ:
Next, Laura. ...I was afraid of the maise shifter, when...
It's impossible to explore here, you know?
だって怖いものは怖いんだもの……: I mean, I'm scared of scary things...
まずはそれの克服だな。すぐにすべて払拭するのは無理だろう。\nでもせめて我慢くら:
Let's overcome that first. It'll be impossible to get rid of it all right away.
But I have to at least be able to hold back.
んでノエル。お前は逆に、戦闘に夢中になりすぎだ。: So, Noel, you're actually too engrossed in battle.
うう、でもメイズシフターって倒せば倒すほどいいんでしょ？\n気づいたら楽しくなっ:
Ugh, but the more you beat the Maizsifter, the better, right?
Before I knew it, I was having fun...!
間違ってない……が、必要ない深追いに仲間の射線を妨害したり、\nとにかく周りが見:
I'm not wrong... But I'd be able to interfere with my comrades' line of fire in a deep pursuit that wasn't necessary
Anyway, I can't see my surroundings.
戦闘意欲があるのはいい。\nだからもっと効率的に倒せる方法をよく学ぶんだ。:
It's good that she's willing to fight.
That's why you need to learn how to defeat them more efficiently.
で……心香。確かに能力はあるようだ。\nだが、絶望的なまでに協調性がない。それが:
So... Shinka. She does seem to be capable.
But they're hopelessly uncoordinated. That's the biggest problem.
自分の仕事はこなしているわ。それで十分では？: I'm doing my job. Isn't that enough?
チームで動く以上、それじゃ困るんだよ。\n探索はひとりでするものじゃない。:
As long as we're working as a team, that'll be a problem.
Searching isn't something you do alone.
なら、みんなが私に合わせればいいだけじゃない。\nどうして私が『下』に合わせなく:
In that case, everyone just had to match me.
Why do I have to go with "down"?
こんな具合だ。シリウスシュガーも落ちこぼれと言われていたが、\n可愛く見えるくら:
"This is how it's going to be." Sirius Sugaru was also called a washout, but...
She's so clumsy that she looks cute.
それが『特別養成校舎』というものなのだろう。: That must be what they call a "special training school building."
ほほーう、協調性。つまりは%usernameusernameuserna%も、\:
Hohoh, cooperative. In other words, %usernameusernameuserna%, too.
That means you should rely on us, right?
あたし達も体調戻ったし、そろそろ気合入れよっかって話してたんだ。\n明日からの訓:
Now that we're back in shape, we've been talking about how we should get fired up.
Leave tomorrow's training to me.
……この子達、多分このままじゃ一生『パイロット』になれない。: ...These kids probably won't be able to be 'pilots' for the rest of their lives.
ま、いつまでも休んでばっかじゃ体もなまるし！: Well, if I just rest forever, I'll lose my body!
人に教えることで、自分の動きを見直すのにもつながりますもんね！: Teaching people also helps you reconsider your own movements!
はい！ %usernameusernameuserna%さんがしてくれたことを、:
Yes! What Xenois-san did for me...
Now it's our turn to return it!
そういうわけで、あたしにいい考えがあるんだ。\n七彩ちゃん、ちょっと後で付き合っ:
That's why I have a good idea.
Nanaya, can you come with me a little later?
